item.title: A new beginning
item.description: Looks like every ten years I attempt to write a blog. This time around it seems that I actually have something to say, so let’s see what happens. :)

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there. I am Lóránt Pintér from Hungary, and here I’m jotting down thoughts on my meandering exploration around topics like embedded technologies, product design, coding etc.
